name.ja: <ruby>深<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>淵<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>海<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>アビス・クラーケン［<ruby>Ｌ<rt>エル</rt></ruby>］

requirement.en: Shuffle up to 5 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field loses ATK/DEF equal to [the number of monsters shuffled into the Deck to meet the requirement] x 300 until the end of this turn. Then, if this card is in Maximum Mode and you have no monsters in your Graveyard, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.
